title: Raft People
description: What do you do if the sea waters are rising but your escape routes are blocked? Ride along with ordinary people as they try to survive global flooding when the highways are jammed because of refugees and the authorities are overwhelmed. At the time of the Big Flood, Liz Green is a troubled teen, living with her single mother and two brothers. Lucky for them, their neighbors include a retired female Special Forces naval operative and an eighty year old navel engineer. Learn how ordinary people become "Raft People" in order to survive global catastrophe.
author: M.L. Katz
